data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 6, Kei Koizumi (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 15, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Kota Mizunuma.
In the minute 17, Great play from Ryuta Koike to set up the goal.
Kashima's Ayase Ueda has run offside.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 23, Kashima takes a corner from the left.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal! Erik extends Yokohama Marinos's lead to 2-0.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Yokohama Marinos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kashima.
In the minute 32, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Marcos Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kashima at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 35, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Ayase Ueda keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Shoma Doi.
In the minute 40, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashima.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
The away team replace Ryotaro Araki with Yasushi Endo.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 49, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Goal kick for Kashima at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Kashima drive upfield and Ryota Nagaki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 53, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Junior Santos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos is back on the field again.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima's Katsuya Nagato is on target but unsuccessful.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 59, Koki Machida (Kashima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 59, Kashima's Everaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Kashima at Nissan Stadium.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Kei Koizumi (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Kento Misao is on a sub for Ryota Nagaki for Kashima.
In the minute 64, Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Kashima pushes forward through Everaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Everaldo is booked for the away team.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kashima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 67, Takahiro Ogihara (Yokohama Marinos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Erik (Yokohama Marinos) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 69, Erik of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 73, Free kick Kashima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Katsuya Nagato of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 77, Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Marcos Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 78, Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Everaldo.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Keigo Tsunemoto is replacing Kei Koizumi for the away team.
In the minute 79, Kashima make their fourth substitution with Sho Ito replacing Shoma Doi.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Marcos Junior gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Takuya Kida with Jun Amano.
Yokohama Marinos make their second substitution with Daizen Maeda replacing Kota Mizunuma.
Ado Onaiwu is replacing Junior Santos for the home team.
In the minute 83, Free kick Kashima.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Kashima take a 2-3 lead thanks to Yasushi Endo.
In the minute 84, Sho Ito with an assist there.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 87, Makito Ito (Yokohama Marinos) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kento Misao (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
Shintaro Nago is on a sub for Ayase Ueda for Kashima.
